    1: from numpy.lib import NumpyVersion
    2: 
    3: version = NumpyVersion("1.8.0")
    4: 
    5: version.vstring
    6: version.version
    7: version.major
    8: version.minor
    9: version.bugfix
   10: version.pre_release
   11: version.is_devversion
   12: 
   13: version == version
   14: version != version
   15: version < "1.8.0"
   16: version <= version
   17: version > version
   18: version >= "1.8.0"
